page1.title: GAME RULES
page1.tf0:
All symbols pay in blocks of minimum 5 symbols connected horizontally or vertically.
The game is played on a 7 x 7 grid of symbols.
page1.item2:
This is the SCATTER symbol.
SCATTER symbol appears on all reels.

page2.title: TUMBLE FEATURE
page2.tf0:
The TUMBLE FEATURE means that after every spin, winning combinations are paid and all winning symbols
disappear. The remaining symbols fall to the bottom of the screen and the empty positions are replaced
with symbols coming from above.
page2.tf1:
Tumbling will continue until no more winning combinations appear as a result of a tumble. There's no limit to the
number of possible tumbles.
page2.tf2: All wins are added to the player's balance after all of the tumbles resulted from a base spin have been played.
page2.tf3:
Whenever a winning symbol explodes it marks its spot on the grid. After the second time a symbol explodes on
the same spot a multiplier is added to the spot, starting from: 1x2 and doubling every time one more symbol
explodes on top of it up to a maximum of x128. The multiplier applies to all winning combinations that hit on top of it.
If more multipliers are involved in the same winning combination, they add to each other.
page2.tf4:
In the base game all the marked spots with multipliers last until the end of the tumbling sequence, being cleared
when there are no more tumbles.
page2.tf5:
Hit 3, 4, 5, 6, or 7 SCATTER symbols anywhere on the screen to win 10, 12, 15, 20, or 30 free spins, respectively.
During the FREE SPINS round marked spots and their multipliers remain in place until the end of the round and can
increase with subsequent tumbles across all of the free spins.
page2.tf6:
Hit 3, 4, 5, 6, or 7 SCATTER symbols during the round anywhere on the screen to win 10, 12, 15, 20, or 30 additional
free spins respectively.
page2.tf7: Special reels are in play during the feature.

page3.title: MAX WIN
page3.tf0:
The maximum win amount is limited to 5,000x bet in both base game and free spin.
If the total win of a FREE SPINS ROUND reaches 5,000x bet the round immediately ends, win is awarded and all remaining
free spins are forfeited.
page3.tf1:
The FREE SPINS ROUND can be instantly triggered from the base game by buying it for 100x current total bet.
When buying the FREE SPINS round, you can hit 3, 4, 5, 6 or 7 SCATTER symbols randomly.

page4.title: GAME RULES
page4.tf0: High volatility games pay out less often on average but the chance to hit big wins in a short time span is higher.
page4.tf1:
Symbols pay anywhere.
All wins are multiplied by the base bet.
page4.tf2: All values are expressed as actual wind in coins.
page4.tf3: When winning with multiple symbols, all wins are added to the total win.
page4.tf4:
Free spins is awarded to the player after the round completes.
The total win from past Freespins includes the total win of the series.
page4.tf5: The theoretical RTP of this game is 96.506.
page4.tf7: Any malfunction voids all pays and plays.

page5.title: HOW TO PLAY

textCombined1.part3: buttons to change the bet value and open the bet menu.

page5.tf0: Select the bet you want to use in the game.

textCombined2.part1: Opens the SETTINGS menu contains settings which affect the way the game is being played.

page5.tf2:
The CREDIT and BET labels display the current balance and the total bet. 
Click on the labels to switch between token view and cash view.

textCombined4.part2: You can use the buttons to increase or decrease the current bet and make bet adjustments and

page5.tf3: open the betting menu where you can make changes to your bets.
page5.tf4:
You can use the buttons to move the current bet up or down and open the betting menu 
where you can change bet allocations.

page6.title: SETTINGS MENU
page6.tf0:
INTRO SCREEN - toggles the introductory screen on and off
AMBIENCE - toggles the ambient sound and music in the game on and off
SOUND EFFECTS - Turns the game's sound effects on and off
GAME HISTORY - Opens the game history page
page6.tf3: The bet menu shows the bet multiplier available in the game, and the current total bet in both coins and cash.

textCombined2.part3: buttons in the BET and COIN VALUE fields to change the values.

page6.tf4: The maximum win amount is limited to 5000 times the bet.
page6.tf5: A round yields up to 4 DP, and all remaining features are lost.
